content.name: Terran Plot Scene 2
content.description: L2 Terran Plot Scene 2, Terran Recon

change.author: Owen Lake
change.description: B7: Added fail condition for escort.

change.author: Owen Lake
change.description: B4: Added final escort with Xenon incursion. Fixed several bugs.

cue.name: L2M002 Talk to Ishiyama Post Mars

param.name: Cue
param.comment: Where the created ships will be localised.

param.name: Group Name
param.comment: The group name assigned to the created ships.

param.name: Maker Race
param.comment: The race ID of the ship maker. Can be strings 'default' or 'pirategroup'

param.name: Sector
param.comment: The sector if spawned in space

set_group_command.comment: To stop them attacking the Pirate

param.name: AnxietySeconds
param.comment: Number of seconds needed to be fully aggitated

param.name: Range
param.comment: How close the player must be (in metres)

param.name: Length
param.comment: How long the object must be scanned for (seconds)

param.name: Cue
param.comment: The cue where values will be localized

param.name: FinalSector
param.comment: The Address of the destination. Overrides all other criteria.

param.name: PatrolSector
param.comment: The next sector on the way to the destination

param.name: SetObjective
param.comment: Set the objectives and run the Objective library

param.name: UseTimer
param.comment: Override the plot signal and use a timer

param.name: Difficulty
param.comment: The value address for the difficulty

param.name: FeedbackName
param.comment: The address where the step value is stored

param.name: PatrolTime
param.comment: Duration of patrol per sector in seconds

param.name: OBS Counter
param.comment: The name of the OBS counter

param.name: OBS Cue
param.comment: The cue name where the ship groups are saved too

param.name: OBSFleetRace
param.comment: The maker race ID of the ships or the racemask 'default' or 'pirategroup'

param.name: OBSFleetPilotsRace
param.comment: The race ID of the pilots

param.name: OBSMissionRank
param.comment: A 0-30 scale preferably based on the players fight rank

param.name: OBS Dock Support
param.comment: 0/1 Sets if the created support ships are docked with their homebase

param.name: OBS Support Overflow
param.comment: 0/1 Sets if additional support ships are created outside when the homebase is full

cue.name: L2M002 Patrol Circle of Labour Chatter

reset_cue.cue: L2M002 Patrol Circle of Labour Chatter

param.name: Cue
param.comment: The cue where the briefing will be localised

param.name: ActiveSteps
param.comment: Value name to save the current number of active steps

param.name: DestSector
param.comment: The Address of the destination sector

param.name: GroupName
param.comment: The Address of the Convoy Group

param.name: AllowLoss
param.comment: 0/1: Can the mission continue after a ship has been destroyed

param.name: UnhighlightAtDock
param.comment: 0/1: Unhightlight the ships when they dock

param.name: Difficulty
param.comment: The value address for the difficulty
